statements: SELECT * FROM game_events WHERE event_date = '2022-05-15';
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM game_events WHERE event_time < '12:00';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM game_events WHERE notification_sent = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM game_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-05-31';
SELECT event_name, event_time FROM game_events ORDER BY event_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_events WHERE event_date = '2022-12-25' AND notification_sent = TRUE;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM game_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-12-25' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT event_date FROM game_events WHERE notification_sent = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM game_events WHERE event_time BETWEEN '18:00' AND '22:00';
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_time FROM game_events WHERE event_name LIKE 'P%' ORDER BY event_name ASC, event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM game_events WHERE game_id = 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM game_events;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM game_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-08-01';
SELECT notification_message, notification_type FROM notifications WHERE notification_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30';
SELECT * FROM game_events WHERE event_date > '2021-01-01' AND game_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM game_events WHERE event_id = 5;
SELECT notification_message, notification_date FROM notifications WHERE player_id = 10 ORDER BY notification_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM game_events WHERE event_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND event_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, notification_message FROM game_events JOIN notifications ON game_events.event_id = notifications.notification_id WHERE notification_type = 'alert';
SELECT * FROM GameEvents;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM GameEvents WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_time FROM GameEvents ORDER BY event_time ASC;
SELECT notification_id, player_id, message FROM Notifications WHERE is_read = FALSE;
SELECT player_id, schedule_date, event_name FROM PlayerSchedule JOIN GameEvents ON PlayerSchedule.game_event_id = GameEvents.event_id;
SELECT * FROM GameEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC, event_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM GameEvents WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' AND event_time BETWEEN '09:00:00' AND '18:00:00';
SELECT event_name, COUNT(*) AS event_count FROM GameEvents GROUP BY event_name HAVING event_count > 1 ORDER BY event_count DESC;
SELECT p.player_id, g.event_name, p.schedule_date FROM PlayerSchedule p INNER JOIN GameEvents g ON p.game_event_id = g.event_id WHERE p.schedule_date = '2022-11-15';
SELECT n.notification_id, n.message, p.player_id FROM Notifications n INNER JOIN PlayerSchedule p ON n.player_id = p.player_id WHERE n.is_read = FALSE ORDER BY n.notification_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM EventSchedule;
SELECT event_name, event_datetime FROM EventSchedule ORDER BY event_datetime DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM Player WHERE player_status = TRUE;
SELECT game_name, game_genre FROM Game WHERE game_release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM GameNotification ORDER BY notification_datetime ASC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_datetime, game_id FROM EventSchedule;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_email, player_status FROM Player WHERE player_status = TRUE;
SELECT notification_id, notification_text, notification_datetime, game_id, player_id FROM GameNotification WHERE notification_datetime > '2023-01-01';
SELECT game_id, game_name, game_genre, game_release_date FROM Game ORDER BY game_release_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EventSchedule JOIN Game ON EventSchedule.game_id = Game.game_id;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' AND event_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players ORDER BY player_name ASC;

SELECT player_name, event_name, notification_date FROM players JOIN player_events ON players.player_id = player_events.player_id JOIN events ON player_events.event_id = events.event_id ORDER BY notification_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY event_date ASC;

SELECT players.player_name, events.event_name FROM players JOIN player_events ON players.player_id = player_events.player_id JOIN events ON player_events.event_id = events.event_id WHERE events.event_date < NOW() ORDER BY players.player_name ASC, events.event_name DESC;

SELECT notifications.notification_id, notifications.notification_date, players.player_name, events.event_name FROM notifications JOIN players ON notifications.player_id = players.player_id JOIN events ON notifications.event_id = events.event_id WHERE notifications.notification_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND NOW() ORDER BY notifications.notification_date ASC;

SELECT events.event_id, events.event_name, COUNT(player_events.player_id) AS total_players FROM events LEFT JOIN player_events ON events.event_id = player_events.event_id GROUP BY events.event_id, events.event_name HAVING total_players > 5 ORDER BY total_players DESC, events.event_name ASC;
